string.value: I completed making #b#t4031497##k but there's no use. I'll have to ask #b#p2020005##k to find out how to give magic powers to the summoned-being.

As I showed him the completed #b#t4031497##k, #b#p2020005##k said all that's left is to get the Spiritual Stone which ignite the power. He said I would be able to find the stone in another world and that #b#p2041023##k would know how to get there.\r\n#i4031469##t4031469# #b#c4031469#/1

Right! That's the way! I should find a #bspiritual stone contained element-based magic#k! If you soak element-based magic into a normal summon, it won't work, as your power conflicts with the summon's. If the spirit of summon is a different type of element-based magic, it will spring back. That means it will be stronger. Fantastic!
Get #b#t4031469##k. The spiritual stone of ice element-based magic will be the best!
Very good. #b#t4031469##k can be found in different world. There's door to the different world deep inside of Ludibrium. Magician #b#p2041023##k will know how to open it. Ask him to open it.
Hmm? Does this theory miss some point? I'd like to hear your explanation.
Oh! You gathered #b#t4031469##k.Now you just have to give the power of a spiritual stone to #b#t4031451##k. Aren't you excited? I'll make your summon now.
Now you can use #r#q2221005##k, the summon of ice. How do you feel going beyond element-based magic? You opened a new chapter in the Maple World's magic history!
Hope you pave the way for New Magical Theories someday!
If you have #b#t4031469##k, I can make your summon. Go and get it!
